```{r}
library(calendR)

yearCal <- calendR(year=2023, 
        mbg.col="blue",
        months.col="white",
        start="S",
        lty=1,
        days.col="lightblue",
        weeknames=c("Su", "Mo", "Tu", "We", "Th", "Fr", "Sa"))

dates <- rep(NA, 28)
dates[c(1:3)] <- "J-term"
dates[c(4:13)] <- "Winter break"
dates[c(14:28)] <- "Spring semester"

february <- calendR(year=2023, month=2,
                    title="February 2023",
                    weeknames=c("Sun", "Mon", "Tues", "Weds", "Thur", "Fri", "Sat"),
                    start="M",
                    lty=1,
                    special.days=dates,
                    special.col=c("lightyellow", "lightyellow", "lightblue"),
                    legend.pos="bottom")

calendars()
```
